```{python}
#| echo: false
from shiny import ui

def custom_component(*args, **kwargs):
    return ui.Tag("custom-component", *args, **kwargs)

def component_card(*args, **kwargs):
    return custom_component(
        {"class": "g-col-md-4 g-col-sm-6 g-col-12 component-list-column"},
        *args,
        **kwargs
    )

def display_component_card(*args, **kwargs):
    display(component_card(*args, **kwargs))
```

```{python}

display_component_card(

        "checkboxgroup",
        None,
        ["Watch me Whip", "Watch me Nae Nae", "Watch neither"]
    )
)

display_component_card(
    ui.input_date("date", None)
)

display_component_card(
    ui.input_switch("switch", "Make it switchable", True)
)
```
